title: Some contacts have disappeared from my Pixel 3
content:
Hi all, 
Today I noticed that many of my texts are not tied to a contact anymore, while some are still tied to a contact.  The ones that still do have a number associated with a contact are sync'd to my gmail account, while I guess the others (which were generally more recent and added to my phone) appear not to be in my gmail.  

I think it had to do with yesterday trying to edit a contact and selecting a gmail account, now a good portion of the contacts have just completely disappeared.  It is quite annoying and I don't want to manually re-add them in by looking through my texts and then inferring which contact it is.  

Any help would be appreciated.  This just seems so annoying, how can I add a contact to your phone and then have it completely disappear?
